CustomField.description: It shows available Rule types: "Best Option" (Rules belonging to same Point Type compete against each other. Points are given only for the Rule that represents the best choice for Members) or "No Competition" (All Rules are applied. Points, Instant Rewards and/or Instant Badges are given for each Rule).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Choose a Rule Type: Best Option (Points are awarded only if this Rule grants more than any other for a given Action and Point Type) or No Competition (This rule is always applied)
CustomField.label: Type
